title: Review: Challenge fattens up Strada Bianca as wide, supple 40mm gravel-ready slick tire
content:
Following up the all-new 40mm Getaway, Challenge has another new high-volume hardpack dirt road & gravel tire in the new Strada Bianca 40. Combining their newest supple handmade tubeless construction and new 40mm width with their classic herringbone road tire tread, the newÂ Strada Bianca is more versatile than ever for all-road riding. author: Cory Benson
